message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life. This is typically labeled as "Depreciation" in a cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see the "Depreciation" line item under "Cash Flow From Operating Activities" with an amount of 127633.22.

Depreciation represents the systematic allocation of the cost of tangible assets over their useful lives, which matches exactly what we're looking for.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '127633.22'} }
```
